channel.title: Productivity on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Productivity on FinanClub

item.title: UK Workers Miss Out on Europe's Shift to Fewer Hours on the Job
item.description: UK Workers Miss Out on Europe’s Shift to Fewer Hours on the Job British workers work some of the longest hours in the developed world, with an average of 42.8 hours per week. This is more than the average working hours in all other OECD countries, except for Mexico and South Korea.

item.title: Musk Can't Stop Talking About the Nonstop Grind
item.description: Musk’s Work Ethic: A Recipe for Success or Burnout? Elon Musk is known for his long hours and demanding work ethic. He has often said that hard work is essential for success, and he has pushed his employees to work long hours as well.
